meaningMnemonic: If you play <radical>blackjack</radical> on the <radical>moon</radical> in the <radical>winter</radical>, your cards will <kanji>scatter</kanji> everywhere. The cards scatter because the gravity is so weak on the moon, so the blackjack game is prone to disaster.
readingMnemonic: You are playing blackjack with <reading>San</reading>ta-san (さん). Santa-san is doing his best to use his Christmas magic to prevent the <kanji>scatter</kanji> of cards, but it’s not working out so well. Good effort, Santa-san.
